verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician אַל־ תַּשְׁחֵת֮ <S%H516><s%> Altaschith לְדָוִ֪ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִ֫כְתָּ֥ם <S%H4387><s%> Michtam בִּשְׁלֹ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> sent שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> when Saul וַֽיִּשְׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> and they watched אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֝בַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4191><s%> to kill him הַצִּילֵ֖נִי <S%H5337><s%> Deliver מֵאֹיְבַ֥י ׀ <S%H341><s%> me from mine enemies אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> O my God מִּמִתְקוֹמְמַ֥י <S%H6965><s%> me from them that rise up תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7682><s%> defend

הַ֭צִּילֵנִי <S%H5337><s%> Deliver מִפֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> me from the workers אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity וּֽמֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> men דָ֝מִ֗ים <S%H1818><s%> me from bloody הוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3467><s%> and save

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֪ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָֽרְב֡וּ <S%H693><s%> For lo they lie in wait לְנַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> for my soul יָג֣וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> are gathered עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against עַזִ֑ים <S%H5794><s%> the mighty לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor פִשְׁעִ֖י <S%H6588><s%> against me not [for] my transgression וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor חַטָּאתִ֣י <S%H2403><s%> nor [for] my sin יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD

בְּֽלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> no עָ֭וֹן <S%H5771><s%> themselves without [my] fault יְרוּצ֣וּן <S%H7323><s%> They run וְיִכּוֹנָ֑נוּ <S%H3559><s%> and prepare ע֖וּרָה <S%H5782><s%> awake לִקְרָאתִ֣י <S%H7125><s%> to help וּרְאֵה׃ <S%H7200><s%> me and behold

וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָֽה־ <S%H3068><s%> Thou therefore O LORD אֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> God צְבָא֡וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָקִ֗יצָה <S%H6974><s%> awake לִפְקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> to visit כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> all the heathen אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּחֹ֨ן <S%H2603><s%> be not merciful כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to any בֹּ֖גְדֵי <S%H898><s%> transgressors אָ֣וֶן <S%H205><s%> to any wicked סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

יָשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> They return לָ֭עֶרֶב <S%H6153><s%> at evening יֶהֱמ֥וּ <S%H1993><s%> they make a noise כַכָּ֗לֶב <S%H3611><s%> like a dog וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ <S%H5437><s%> and go round about עִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> the city

הִנֵּ֤ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> Behold יַבִּ֘יע֤וּן <S%H5042><s%> Behold they belch out בְּפִיהֶ֗ם <S%H6310><s%> with their mouth חֲ֭רָבוֹת <S%H2719><s%> swords בְּשִׂפְתוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8193><s%> [are] in their lips כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who שֹׁמֵֽעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> for who [say they] doth hear

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> But thou O LORD תִּשְׂחַק־ <S%H7832><s%> shalt laugh לָ֑מוֹ תִּ֝לְעַ֗ג <S%H3932><s%> in derision לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> at them thou shalt have all the heathen

עֻ֭זּוֹ <S%H5797><s%> [Because of] his strength אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֶשְׁמֹ֑רָה <S%H8104><s%> will I wait כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> upon thee for God מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ <S%H4869><s%> [is] my defence

אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> The God [חַסְדֹּו כ] (חַסְדִּ֣י <S%H2617><s%> favour ק) יְקַדְּמֵ֑נִי <S%H6923><s%> shall prevent אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> me God יַרְאֵ֥נִי <S%H7200><s%> shall let me see בְשֹׁרְרָֽי׃ <S%H8324><s%> [my desire] upon mine enemies

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּהַרְגֵ֤ם ׀ <S%H2026><s%> Slay פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> or יִשְׁכְּח֬וּ <S%H7911><s%> forget עַמִּ֗י <S%H5971><s%> them not lest my people הֲנִיעֵ֣מוֹ <S%H5128><s%> scatter בְ֭חֵילְךָ <S%H2428><s%> them by thy power וְהוֹרִידֵ֑מוֹ <S%H3381><s%> and bring them down מָֽגִנֵּ֣נוּ <S%H4043><s%> our shield אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <S%H136><s%> O Lord

חַטַּאת־ <S%H2403><s%> [For] the sin פִּ֗ימוֹ <S%H6310><s%> of their mouth דְּֽבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> [and] the words שְׂפָ֫תֵ֥ימוֹ <S%H8193><s%> of their lips וְיִלָּכְד֥וּ <S%H3920><s%> let them even be taken בִגְאוֹנָ֑ם <S%H1347><s%> in their pride וּמֵאָלָ֖ה <S%H423><s%> and for cursing וּמִכַּ֣חַשׁ <S%H3585><s%> and lying יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H5608><s%> [which] they speak

כַּלֵּ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> Consume בְחֵמָה֮ <S%H2534><s%> [them] in wrath כַּלֵּ֪ה <S%H3615><s%> consume וְֽאֵ֫ינֵ֥מוֹ <S%H369><s%> may be no וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> [them] that they [may] not [be] and let them know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> that God מֹשֵׁ֣ל <S%H4910><s%> ruleth בְּיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> in Jacob לְאַפְסֵ֖י <S%H657><s%> unto the ends הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

וְיָשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> let them return לָ֭עֶרֶב <S%H6153><s%> And at evening יֶהֱמ֥וּ <S%H1993><s%> [and] let them make a noise כַכָּ֗לֶב <S%H3611><s%> like a dog וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ <S%H5437><s%> and go round about עִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> the city

הֵ֭מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like [יְנוּעוּן כ] (יְנִיע֣וּן <S%H5128><s%> continually ק) לֶאֱכֹ֑ל <S%H398><s%> for meat אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not יִ֝שְׂבְּע֗וּ <S%H7646><s%> if they be not satisfied וַיָּלִֽינוּ׃ <S%H3885><s%> and grudge

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I אָשִׁ֣יר <S%H7891><s%> But I will sing עֻזֶּךָ֮ <S%H5797><s%> of thy power וַאֲרַנֵּ֥ן <S%H7442><s%> yea I will sing aloud לַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning חַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ <S%H2617><s%> of thy mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיִ֣יתָ <S%H1961><s%> have been מִשְׂגָּ֣ב <S%H4869><s%> for thou hast been my defence לִ֑י וּ֝מָנ֗וֹס <S%H4498><s%> and refuge בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day צַר־ <S%H6862><s%> of my trouble לִֽי׃

עֻ֭זִּי <S%H5797><s%> Unto thee O my strength אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֲזַמֵּ֑רָה <S%H2167><s%> will I sing כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> for God מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <S%H4869><s%> [is] my defence אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> [and] the God חַסְדִּֽי׃ <S%H2617><s%> of my mercy
